message: Ignore in module Foo: Use module export list ▫︎ Found: "module Foo where" ▫︎ Perhaps: "module Foo (\n module Foo\n ) where" ▫︎ Note: an explicit list is usually better
Warning in someStr in module Foo: Redundant do ▫︎ Found: "do show" ▫︎ Perhaps: "show"
Suggestion in someStr in module Foo: Redundant bracket ▫︎ Found: "do show $ ((map (x +) xs))" ▫︎ Perhaps: "do show $ map (x +) xs"
